entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Gagetown 12:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -5.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 44 %

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain or ice pellets in the morning then to rain late in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
